document.full_text: the pilot killed in a plane crash with former alaska senator ted stevens last summer should have undergone a more rigorous medical exam before getting his license back following a 2006 stroke, u.s. safety officials said in a report on tuesday.
document.title: report on ted stevens plane crash faults faa
lines_and_colors: the pilot killed in a plane crash with former alaska senator ted stevens last summer should have undergone a more rigorous medical exam before getting his license back following a 2006 stroke, u.s. safety officials said in a report on tuesday.
